name: Orbatron
description:
Orbatron is an exciting game that will test your reflexes, focus, and spatial reasoning.
Collect orbs, chain combos, and develop strategies to master each unique level.

  • Action-packed, challenging gameplay
  • Five main gameplay modes - Cluster, Flight, Monolith, Special, and Endless
  • Find Hidden Orbs to unlock Special Levels with unique gameplay mechanics
  • Gorgeous surreal & eclectic environments
  • Approachable for players of all ages and skill levels, yet highly challenging and competitive
  • 93 Unique and challenging levels
  • Leaderboards and Achievements
  • Expansive soundtrack
  • Extremely fast load times
  • Currently Rated 4.9/5.0 in the Oculus Store
